name: NBA Live 2001
synopsis: NBA Live 2001 delivers high-flyin', fast-paced NBA action plus a whole lot more. You can take control of the post and hit a jump hook or fly above the rim with a nasty "in-your-face" slam. With all-new player reactions, bench sequences and color commentary, NBA Live 2001 comes alive, bringing more emotion and atmosphere to the court than ever before.
